mapper.select: select s.id shirtId,s.title,s.linkUrl,s.sourceId,s.brandId,s.minPrice,s.maxPrice,s.design,s.sleeve,s.isActive, s.imgType,s.shirtImg,s.status,s.weight,s.createTime,s.updateTime, (select group_concat(sp.colorId separator ',') from shirt_param sp where sp.shirtId=s.id and sp.status=0) colorIds from shirt s where s.id=#{shirtId} limit 1
mapper.update:
update shirt
title=#{title},
linkUrl=#{linkUrl},
sourceId=#{sourceId},
brandId=#{brandId},
minPrice=#{minPrice},
maxPrice=#{maxPrice},
design=#{design},
sleeve=#{sleeve},
isActive=#{isActive},
imgType=#{imgType},
shirtImg=#{shirtImg},
status=#{status},
weight=#{weight},
updateTime=now()
where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into shirt (title,linkUrl,sourceId,brandId,minPrice,maxPrice,design,sleeve,isActive, imgType,shirtImg,status,weight,createTime,updateTime) values (#{title}, #{linkUrl}, #{sourceId}, #{brandId}, #{minPrice}, #{maxPrice}, #{design}, #{sleeve}, #{isActive}, #{imgType}, #{shirtImg}, 0, 0, now(), now())
insert into shirt_param (shirtId,colorId,price,status,createTime,updateTime) values (#{shirtId}, #{colorId}, #{price}, #{status}, now(), now())
